content.p: State of Georgia ________ County I, ______________, first being duly sworn, make this affidavit: I, ________________________, agree to serve as arbitrator in the case of __________________________ v. ______________________________ and will decide any issue put before me without favor or affection to any party and without prejudice for or against any party. I will follow and apply the law as given to me by the referee and will accept and abide by all decisions of the referee. I also agree not to discuss this case or any issue with any person except when all other arbitrators and the referee are present. ______________, L. S.
Each arbitrator selected under this article shall sign the following affidavit before the selection is effective and before acting as an arbitrator:
